UserAccount.title: UserAccount
UserAccount.description: Stores user account information for the HireLogic AI application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user account.

email.description: User's email address for login and communication.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user account was created.

lastLogin.description: Timestamp indicating the user's last login.

termsOfServiceAccepted.description: Flag indicating whether the user has accepted the terms of service.

/userAccounts/{userAccountId}.description: Stores user account information. The 'userAccountId' parameter corresponds to the user's Firebase Auth UID.
